entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
